Artem Timoshenko
About Research Teaching Honors CV

I am an Associate Professor at the Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University. My research examines how data, experimentation, and algorithms are transforming innovation, customer engagement, and marketing strategies.

Current projects explore how generative AI is reshaping new product development and how data-driven personalization can accelerate marketing effectiveness. I work closely with industry partners to identify high-impact challenges, propose new methodological solutions, and design proof-of-concept studies that deliver actionable insights.

I am available for consulting on customer analytics and business applications of AI. Contact me via email or find me on LinkedIn. For more about my background, check out my CV.
